channel.title: Matched Criteria :: Fusion CAC Documentation
channel.description: CDI Users Only The Matched Criteria viewer is only shown if your current role is CDI. Matched criteria allow you to see why the chart was routed to you. The matched criteria group is a list of “criteria group” that the chart matched upon when it went through workflow. These criteria groups are used to indicate a “possible” query opportunity based upon the criteria outlined in workflow.
